name: Poison S. Brew [Flower Viewing]
ability: Moderately increases all allies' Crit DMG.

additional_data.description: An unusual spirit that can produce a strange sake to weaken demons. When springtime arrives, everyone at the Bureau of the Occult wants to go cherry blossom viewing with her because they know how free she is with doling out the sake. She claims that spring sake is exceptional, enjoying it with the cherry blossoms almost every day. Naturally, she says exactly the same thing about the stars in summer, the moon in autumn, and the snow in winter...
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 12/04/17
◦ She was originally introduced as a Phantasma but was later changed to an Anima.

main: "Looks like the drinking starts early today!"
skill: "This brew was inspired by the cherry blossoms!"
summon: "How about joining me, Master? For old times' sake!"
